title: Polki Diamond and Emerald 'Chandramukhi' Haaram
features: Features an intricate geometric design with each polki diamond set in a triangular frame, bordered by pave-set brilliant-cut diamonds. The focal point is a large, vibrant green emerald cabochon, framed by delicate gold work and diamond accents. The overall design is inspired by the Chandramukhi style, a modern interpretation of traditional South Indian jewelry.
colors: Predominantly gold and white (diamonds) with a striking emerald green centerpiece. The contrasting colors create a visually appealing and luxurious look.
occasions: and high-end social events. Its contemporary design makes it suitable for both traditional and modern attire.
description: This Haaram combines the timeless allure of polki diamonds with a modern design aesthetic. The high-quality emerald centerpiece adds a touch of regal elegance. Handcrafted by skilled artisans in Hyderabad, ensuring exceptional craftsmanship and durability. Represents a fusion of traditional artistry with contemporary style, making it a unique and valuable addition to any jewelry collection.
